pageContext.claim: “And as you know, we just had approved a $700 billion military budget, the largest ever. $716 billion next year. That means not only safety, but it means jobs.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump did get a $700 billion dollar military budget. But saying it's the biggest budget ever is a stretch. {As a percent of GDP}, it's among the smallest military budgets the U.S. has had since 1960. All of Obama's spending budgets were larger up until 2015.
